title: Impossible 70s typeface?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817145622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-17%20at%2019_3917.10.22%20PM.png)

Does anyone know which font this is? I've seen it many times before. The image is from the mid 70s.

Does a digital version exist? and does anyone have the original sheet?

Any help is highly appreciated!
author: pookeyblow

comments.content: Also known as Zelda in Dan Solo's [Moderne Alphabets book](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817145622/http:/books.google.com/books/about/Moderne_Alphabets.html?id=jjKUFN4DqYgC). There are a couple of digitizations [in the abfonts archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817145622/http:/abfonts.freehostia.com/zelek-shadline.htm).

Some of the fonts at abfonts are not good.  
I guess they digitize typefaces without permission. Do you think it’s ok to steal letters designed for football jerseys?
